attributes.action: STOP MIGRANTS CLAIMING CHILD BENEFIT-FOR CHILDREN LIVING ABROAD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government must stop paying benefits to migrants for their children who currently live abroad. Our welfare system is paying more than £250,000 a week in child benefit for some children who have never entered this country.

rejection.details: The excessive use of capital letters in this petition makes it hard to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
